exerciseTitle: Recording your application of self-soothing activities
p:
This table is in your workbook. Please use it for the next one week to observe and record your use of self-soothing activity when your distress increases. You can generate a new table/form for use next time.

Recording your application of self-soothing activities.

thead: Date and time

Severity of initial distress
(indicate your rating on 0 to 10 scale)

Used a self-soothing activity
(name the activity)

Severity of distress - After using self-soothing
(indicate your rating on 0 to 10 scale)
Plan for the next time (based on your observation, plan what you might want to do next time )
tbody: <input id='' placeholder='DD/MM/YY H:M' type='text' class='td-7-5-1-1 col-md-2 form-control' value=''>
